title: Lutheran Letters - Pier Paolo Pasolini (1987) (129p) [Inua].pdf
description:
Title: Lutheran Letters
Author: Pier Paolo Pasolini and Stuart Hood
Hardcover: 180 pages
Publisher: Carcanet Press Ltd. (May 1, 1987)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0856354104
ISBN-13: 978-0856354106

Description:
The 'Lutheran Letters' consists of several letters sent by Pasolini (no responses are printed in this volume) that discuss the political parties of Italy and the conditions of Italian youth. Very brief space is dedicated to the discussion of film, and much this book will better suit a reader that is well read in the politics of Italy from 1945-1975
